R

removeBomb(int) - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method removes a bomb from the game.
removeDeadObjects() - Method in class system.GamePhysics
This method removes all dead objects on the map as well as explodes the bomb if when the timer runs out.
removeEnemy(int) - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method removes an enemy from the game.
removeExplosion(int) - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method removes an explosion from the game.
removeHardBlock(int) - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method removes a hard block from the game.
removePlayer(int) - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method removes a player from the game.
removePowerUp(int) - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method removes a power up from the game It also plays a sound when the power up is removed.
removeSoftBlock(int) - Method in class system.GameStatus
 
resumeGame() - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method resumes the game from a pause.
RightAction - Class in actions
The RightAction class represents the code that is triggered when the right key is pressed.
RightAction(GameStatus) - Constructor for class actions.RightAction
This method initializes a game status class to be used by the other function.
run() - Method in class system.GameGraphics
This method repaints the frame every 10ms as long as the player is interacting with the game
run() - Method in class system.GamePhysics
This method calls the other methods in the GamePhysics class and starts a timer which runs every 100 ms to check for actions in the Bomberman Game.
